fields.label: Display Title
fields.description: Wether or not to show the title as a headline at the start of the personality quiz.

fields.label: Alt text
fields.description: Alternative text if the browser is unable to load the image.

fields.label: Skip
fields.description: Select if you want the quiz to start on the first question instead of the title screen.

fields.label: Animation
fields.description: The Wheel of Fortune animation will only use the images associated with personalities if ALL personalities has an image associated with them.

fields.label: Personality Image Position
fields.description: Choose how to display the image, if there is any, of the result personality. Background will fill the entire H5P container and center the image. Inline will put the image as an image element between the result personality name and description.

fields.label: Personality name
fields.description: The personality name will be used to associate answers with their respective personalities.

fields.label: Image
fields.description: An image to display on the result screen.

fields.label: Alt text
fields.description: Alternative text if the browser is unable to load the image.

fields.label: Optional: Image
fields.description: Image displayed at the top of the screen above or below the question text.

fields.label: Alt text
fields.description: Alternative text if the browser is unable to load the image.

fields.label: Personalities
fields.description: A comma separated list of personality names associated with this answer.
Images associated with answers will not show up unless all answers associated with a question has an image attached.
fields.label: Optional: Image
Alt text
fields.description: Alternative text if the browser is unable to load the image.

semantics.label: Start
semantics.description: Text displayed on the start quiz button on the title card.

semantics.label: Progress text
semantics.description: Progress text, variables available: @question and @total. Example: '@question of @total'

semantics.label: Animation
semantics.description: Uncheck to turn off all animation

semantics.label: Button Accent
semantics.description: Change the color of the button borders and the animation color fill

semantics.label: Progressbar Color
semantics.description: Determines the color of the progress bar
